title: Rotative Pipes Puzzle
description: Rotative Pipes Puzzle is a game with 70 levels. For each level, you must touch in tiles, rotating them. But the player must make all the tiles interconnected with each other.
instructions: Use your mouse or touch in the screen to rotate the tiles.

title: Side Shot
description: This is shooter puzzle game for kids. The goal of the game is to shoot and destroy colored rings. You will shoot from the side, or tap blue wall to shoot with blue bullets and to destroy only blue rings, or tap red wall to shoot on red rings. Bullets and rings must be matched with same color to destroy them. You can make three mistakes before game is over.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Annihilate
description: Annihilate is an original puzzle game in which you match pairs of atoms of the same color. While trying to fulfill your goal, various obstacles like lasers, black holes or uranium 235 hinder the way.
instructions: Swipe finger or use keyboard arrows to move all dynamic characters on screen in the same direction. Get atoms of the same color close to each other to annihilate. Number of moves is limited.

title: Pull Mermaid Out
description: The little mermaid fell into the lost ancient city on the way home. This ancient city has fallen. Only the drainage pipes are intact. You need to help the little mermaid pull the pins out in order on her way home to protect her safety. Do you have enough strategy?
instructions: Tap and slide to play.

title: Line Side
description: Line Side is a reflex puzzle game. Your job is to control the circle to avoid squares. To do that you need to change lines, to go to the left or to the right side of the line. Tap on the screen to change circle side. You need to change the side in time. Not to fast or to late or you will crash into squares. Make you own score and have fun.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Turquoise Blocks
description: Turquoise Blocks is a game in wich you must drag the pieces to the grid to fill rows or columns to score. You’ll always have three pieces to play. You won’t lose if you run out of space to fit the pieces, your only limitation it will the time (golden bar). You can collect and use coins to power-ups (invert and rotate grid, drag and drop fixed blocks, arrange down the grid and delete pieces).
instructions: Touch in the screen to move the pieces in the grid.

title: Imposter Space Puzzle
description: Imposter Space Puzzle is a free online game from the genre of puzzle and jigsaw games. In this game, you have a total of 6 jigsaw puzzles. You need to start from the first, solve the jigsaw, and go to the next image. You have three modes for each picture: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Lock
description: Lock is a tap puzzle game where you need to tap right in time when orange stack is on yellow ball. Yellow ball will rotate over the circle. The ball will go on left or right side on the circle. Tap on screen at the right time when the ball and the stick match. Make best score at this game and have fun.
instructions: Tap on screen to play

title: Fast German Cars Jigsaw
description: Fast German Cars Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: MatchCraft Match Three
description: Match three in the world of Minecraft Help steve to dig a mine Collect rocks, break ice, extinguish lava, and chop down boulders! New levels every week
instructions: Tap and swipe or mouse

title: Shot
description: Shot is a shooter game. The goal of this game is to shoot from the rotating arrow to the little circle. The circle is small so it will be harder for you to hit it. When you hit the circle, the position of both the arrow and the circle will move. With every hit you will earn points. You have the right to three misses. Then the game will over.
instructions: Use mouse to aim and shoot. Tap on the screen if you play on mobile devices.

title: Vandan The Detective
description: "Vandan The Detective" is a classic hidden object game with an intriguing storyline. In this point-and-click adventure, your task is to locate all the items listed in the picture on the left side of the screen. Be sure to complete each level before time runs out to earn bonus points. Immerse yourself in the captivating world of detective Vandan and put your keen observational skills to the test!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to find hidden objects.

title: Block Stacking
description: This is an addictive hypercasual game. Tap at the right time to stack the blocks and build up your tower as high as possible. Languages supported: English and Russian. PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap at the right time to stack the blocks.

title: Lof Blocks
description: "Lof Blocks is a thrilling block collapse game. Gather groups of similar blocks by touching or clicking on them. Be cautious; collecting a single block costs you 200 points. Your objective is to collect all the blocks to complete each level. Plus, creating bigger groups will earn you power-ups!"
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Orange Ball: BasketGo Puzzle
description: The object of the game is to throw a basketball into the basket using various objects: a clapper box, wooden blocks, spinners, escalators, etc. If you fail, try changing the order of "clicking" on items or changing their properties. Play BasketGo: Incredible Basketball
instructions: The object of the game is to throw a basketball into the basket using various objects: a clapper box, wooden blocks, spinners, escalators, etc. If you fail, try changing the order of "clicking" on items or changing their properties.

title: Dot Dot
description: This is puzzle reflexive game with dots. There is two kinds of dots. Red one and yellow. The dots with same color need to be paired. If you pair dots with different color the game will over. The dots will come from the top of the game. Click on the screen to spread the red dots if necessary. Try to make more points as you can. The commands for this game are simple, just tap on the screen.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Cars and Road
description: "Welcome to 'Cars and Road Connect Match'! Connect similar cars through touch or mouse input, creating groups of 3 or more horizontally, vertically, or diagonally adjacent cars to turn the road blocks blue. Your goal is to transform all the road blocks into blue to complete each of the 24 levels. Can you conquer all the challenges and win the game?"
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: New Year Puddings Match
description: New Year Pudding Match is a delightful game where you'll swap blocks to create groups of 3 or more identical candies, either horizontally or vertically adjacent. Your objective is to collect the specified number of candy units in each level, and you'll encounter various types of candies to match along the way. Enjoy the sweet challenge of this festive game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Woodoku
description: Woodoku is a casual game. Your goal is to put the blocks into the box and fill them and then eliminate them after filling them horizontally or vertically, testing your patience and carefulness. Consider whether the rest of the material can be filled later, and there is enough space for the next round of material. There are three modes to choose from. Have a good time.
instructions: Slide to play.

title: Dr Dice
description: Our absent-minded professor has a lot of trouble with his formulas! This means his laboratory is very chaotic at the moment! But do not panic: by throwing the dice you can help Dr. 5Dice to clear up this mess!
instructions: Throw the dice and make combinations. You can throw the dice three times each turn. After the third roll, choose the combination you have made: all possible combinations are highlighted! The game is over when you have crossed off all the combinations on the chart. Use the combos to throw 1 die again, to throw all dice again, or to give 1 die a specific value! Is there liquid left over in your combo meter at the end of the game? Then you will receive extra points.

title: German Fastest Cars Jigsaw
description: German Fastest Cars Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!

title: Butterfly Kyodai Deluxe
description: The Deluxe edition of the legendary game enjoyed by millions! Connect the same butterflies in this fun connect-2 game Butterfly Kyodai. Can you solve the level before the time runs out? If you are not able to make it in time, give yourself an advantage via with the free hints or time freeze! Collect coins to purchase new background and Butterfly wings in the renewed shop!

title: Circus Words
description: Play Circus Words to begin training your brain and to become a vocabulary master! It’s time to discover mystery hidden words and build as many words as possible! Workout your brain in our brain puzzle with many challenging levels.

title: Dot Tap
description: As the title of the game says - Dot Tap is a touching puzzle game where your job is to tap on the screen when the blue ball should match the purple ball. The position of the purple ball will be changed every time after successful matched balls. Sometimes will be very close to the blue ball and sometimes will be far away. So you need to follow the screen all time and to watch on the position of the purple ball.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Luxury Swedish Cars Jigsaw
description: Luxury Swedish Cars Jigsaw game is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Coin Craze
description: Join the Coin Craze adventure RPG! Guide a brave boy on a coin-collecting mission as he stands on a moving platform. Tap or click when the platform aligns with another to make him leap safely. Beware of the spikes lurking below; a missed platform means the end of the journey. Discover fantastic items as the game advances, enhancing your coin-collecting skills and taking the adventure to new heights!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Bubble Warriors
description: Get ready for an epic battle in Bubble Warriors, a thrilling bubble shooter game! Collect the key to access the next level and eliminate waves of advancing bubbles. Be on the lookout for Iron bubble warriors that require special tactics to defeat. Race against time to complete your mission and earn bonus points. Will you lead your bubble army to victory?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Amazing Sudoku
description: Arrange sudoku blocks to solve sudoku 2021 block puzzle and use hints to get help. Are you looking for exciting new sudoku 2021 tile matching game to play in your free time? Will you like to become the fastest and wittiest sudoku solver in your circle? If that is the case, this amazing sudoku puzzle is the perfect pick for you. Revive the fun and excitement of sudoku classic gaming with this brand newfusion of tile matching and block puzzle sudoku right on your phone’s screen. From smooth and easy gaming controls to challenging new sudoku blocks levels, this game has got everything you need to sharpen your board game puzzle solving skills. Play Amazing Sudoku Free – Challenging Number Puzzle now!
instructions: If you get stuck in the middle of solving a block puzzle level, you can always use sudoku solver hints. The game also offers you options to draft and undo the moves, so you can stay ahead of your game and learn new ways of winning sudoku puzzle.

title: Sweet Candy Hexa Puzzle
description: This is a typical puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is the "Hexagon" version of the classic Tetris game. Drag the hexagon blocks and drop them to the desired places, to form full lines in order to destroy them and earn scores. PLAY NOW AND HAVE FUN!
instructions: Drag and drop the blocks.

title: Sport Car Hexagon
description: Are you ready to win in the sport car hexagon game? If you want to be a winner, you must be the last person to fall off the cliff. you have to be first on the road to victory. Be the first and be the most survivor. grab the scores, be the winner
instructions: Arrow Keys and Space Button / Mobile Touch Control

title: Fairy Puzzle
description: Family jigsaw puzzle with large pieces. The game has 50 levels with different colorful pictures. Knights and dragons, castles and landscapes, pirates and pyramids, and much more is waiting for you in the game!
instructions: Drag and drop a matching puzzle piece onto another to join them and complete the puzzle.

title: Candy Puzzle Blocks
description: You love the Tetris game, you also love candy games, then this game is dedicated to you. Drag the candy blocks to the desired places, to form full candies lines in order to destroy them and earn scores. PLAY NOW AND HAVE FUN!
instructions: Drag and drop the blocks.

title: Tetra Blocks
description: Stack the blocks on top of each other in true Tetris fashion. Fill the rows to remove the blocks as you attempt to score as many points as possible. Keep dropping the blocks as you level up and try to play for as long as possible in this fun online game like Tetris.
instructions: Arrow keys to move and rotate blocks, Spacebar to drop blocks or use tap controls.

title: TRZ Tangram
description: Do you like form shapes? To mount the Tangram Puzzles drag the pieces to their positions; rotate them if necessary. There are 39 Tangram puzzles + Free Mode!
instructions: Use your mouse or touch to move the pieces

title: 3D Rubik
description: Play this awesome 3D Rubiks ame, put your brain to work! It will make you feel super satisfied once you crack it! Double click to start, you can swipe left or right on a single cube on all sides. Will you be able to beat the game? This game is playable on all devices.
instructions: PLay with your mouse to swipe

title: Fit and Go Shape Puzzle
description: Get ready for a fun and immersive shape journey. Try to pass the shapes through the boxes with Maskedgames. You have to be quick for this. On the Zig Zag map, replace the player with the same shape in whatever way the obstacles are on the endless path. Try to reach the highest score by overcoming obstacles quickly and agile. Visit maskedgames.com for more shape games and games in different categories! Have fun.
instructions: Mouse or Touch

title: Gummy Bears Mover
description: Gummy Bear GAme is a delightful puzzle game where you slide rows of cute bears horizontally or vertically to create rows of three or more identical bears. Using your mouse or fingertip, slide the rows and see how many levels you can conquer within the time limit. Are you up for the challenge?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Island Puzzle
description: WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST JUNGLE PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME! Start an exciting adventure in the cutest jungle puzzle matching game! Help the brave pilot and charming cat Tom survive on a desert island. Restore and decorate different areas in the island, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters. What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream island for free! Search for rare and unique artifacts by playing with curious pets, connecting them together in lines as long as possible. Play with little Tom cat, get powerful boosters and help collect precious items!
instructions: Mouse Touch

title: Jigsaw Puzzle: 100.000+ Fun Puzzles
description: We've created a game with beautiful graphics and easy gameplay, that you'll instantly love. Play more than 100.000 different puzzles categorized into thousands of puzzle collections. You'll never run out of puzzles to solve! Jigsaw puzzle comes crammed with features, so laying puzzles have never been so enjoyable. Shuffle the pieces, show a preview, toggle borders, toggle the sound, hide the time, and much more under settings.
instructions: How to start a game: Click a collection from the main screen and then choose a puzzle to play. Set the number of pieces you want in that puzzle and then click "Start Puzzle". That will begin the puzzle. Laying the puzzle: Click and drag to move the pieces and right-click a piece to rotate it. If two pieces fit together, they will "click" together and make a little sound. Once all the pieces are together and you've solved the puzzle and congratulations screen will be shown.

title: fill one line puzzle game
description: Sharpen your mind with a connect-the-block-style one-line brain training puzzle game. A simple but addictive one-line puzzle game that’s completely free to play. Your brain becomes more active the more you play. During your commute, before you sleep… enjoy downtime with brain training. The rules are extremely simple. Just fill in all of the blocks using only one line. Use hints for puzzles that are too hard to solve. Hints are also free, of course. 4 levels of difficulty. A whopping 2,000 puzzles. Don’t get too cozy—the puzzles get harder as you go along. One-line puzzles are mathematical problems with origins in the early 18th century. First posed in Königsberg, the original puzzle revolved around the town’s Pregel River. Mathematical thinking is said to increase work efficiency and prevent aging. Whether math is your bane or your forte, be sure to give this game a try. You’re sure to get hooked on these puzzles!
instructions: Sharpen your mind with a connect-the-block-style one-line brain training puzzle game. A simple but addictive one-line puzzle game that’s completely free to play. Your brain becomes more active the more you play. During your commute, before you sleep… enjoy downtime with brain training. The rules are extremely simple. Just fill in all of the blocks using only one line.

title: Find It Out
description: Could you find out the hidden objects in pictures? If YES! Come and take the challenge!Please find all of objects hidden in the pictures, to be a detective and do not miss any clue!
instructions: Please find all of objects hidden in the pictures

title: Puzzle Pieces
description: Fill circles in this thrilling puzzle game. Earn score, create multicolored circles or finish the level before time ends. Explore all of 60 levels in 6 different game modes. Do you have what it takes to complete all of them?
instructions: Circles are split into small pieces. Your job is easy – move pieces from the center circle into outer ones to fill and remove them. In some game modes, you’ll need to combine them in a certain order.

title: Car Defender
description: Upgrade your vehicle to fend off every wave of enemy attacks! The more gold you have to accumulate to upgrade your vehicles, the higher the level, the more revenue you generate, and the more vehicles you can build. Here are some tasks for you to complete. Come and have a try!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Match Triple 3D Matching Tile
description: The house is a mess, with your toys all over the place, and you need to tidy up your room. You have limited space to tidy up. Every three of the same items can be eliminated to make room. Items also need to be taken out from top to bottom!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Matching Vehicles
description: This is matching game with kids vehicles. Your job is to connect three or more same vehicles. When you do that the vehicle will disappear and you will earn points. If you connect five or more vehicles you will add play time. Increase your playing time and try to spend as many levels and time as you can playing this game. As you progress in the game, the time left for the game will accelerate. Move the finger into same images to connect them.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Cube Pusher
description: Cube Pusher - Arcade game, use the power to push objects. Hold down mouse button to scale, release it to shoot. How much cubes can move in the right position?
instructions: Click/Touch and hold to scale, release to shoot.

title: Snake Swipe Puzzle
description: Snake Swipe Puzzle is a fun and cute logical puzzle game. Find a way to fulfill the maze path covered by the block snake with a soft body. Snake Swipe Puzzle is a fun and cute logical puzzle game. Find a way to fulfill the maze path covered by the block snake with a soft body.
instructions: Tap and slide to play.

title: Unblock Parking Puzzle
description: In this fun and colorful game, you challenge your logic skills, critical thinking, and timing precision. Unblock Parking Puzzle is a very addictive puzzle game. During the rush hour there are too many cars in the parking area. Your task is to unblock the car and move it out of the traffic chaos.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: my puzzle
description: My Puzzle With the game My Puzzle, discover the puzzles in a fun way from your phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids Meu quebra-cabeça Com o jogo My Puzzle, descubra os puzzles de uma forma divertida a partir do seu telemóvel, tablet ou computador. Jogo desenvolvido por: Nau.kids

title: Neon Circles & Color Sort Puzzle
description: Neon Circles & Color Sort Puzzle Game is a challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain! Solve the game with proper strategy and plan your moves to sort colorful hoops. Match the correct color Rings on the row. Easy to play and pleasurable game. Complete puzzling rings challenge and get the score as high as you can. Challenge your friends to compare your score.
